00031     function main() {
00032         $sermonId = intval($_GET['sermonid']);
00033         $fI = $this->getProperties($sermonId);
00034         if (@file_exists(PATH_site.$fI['file'])) {
00035             $extConf = unserialize($GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['EXT']['extConf']['servicemgr']);
00036             $fI['prefix'] = $extConf['sermonPrefix'];
00037             $fI['filename'] = 
00038                 $fI['prefix'].'_'.
00039                 date('Ymd',$fI['datetime']).'_'.
00040                 $this->str2download($fI['title']).
00041                 '.'.$fI['extension'];
00042 
00043             header('Content-Type: '.$fI['mimetype']);
00044             header('Content-Length: '.$fI['filesize']);
00045             header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: Binary');
00046             header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.$fI['filename'].'"');
00047             @readfile(PATH_site.$fI['file']);
00048         } else {
00049             die('file not found');
00050         }
00051     }

00059     function getProperties($sermonId) {
00060         tslib_eidtools::connectDB();
00061         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00062             'uid, event, title, file, filedate, playtime, filesize, mimetype, bitrate, album',   #select
00063             'tx_servicemgr_sermons', #from
00064             'uid='.$sermonId.' and hidden=0 and deleted=0'  #where
00065         );
00066         $res ? $sermon = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res) : die('no fetching result');
00067 
00068         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00069             'uid, datetime',   #select
00070             'tx_servicemgr_events', #from
00071             'uid='.$sermon['event'].' and hidden=0 and deleted=0'  #where
00072         );
00073         $res ? $event = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res) : die('no fetching result');
00074 
00075         $sermon['datetime'] = $event['datetime'];
00076         $sermon['extension'] = $this->fileExtension($sermon['file']);
00077         return $sermon;
00078     }
00079 
00086     function fileExtension($filename){
00087         $parts = split('\.', $filename);
00088         $parts = array_reverse($parts, false);
00089         return $parts[0];
00090     }
00091     
00099     function str2download($str, $replaceDots=true) {
00100         $str = trim($str); //delete starting or ending ' '
00101         
00102         //repace not allowed chars
00103         $notAllowed = array(
00104             '[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}',
00105             '-', '#', '+', '*', '~', '\\', '/',
00106             '!', '"', '§', '$', '%', '&', '=', '?',
00107             ':', ';',
00108             '\'', '`', '´'
00109         );
00110         $pattern = '/[\\'.implode(',\\',$notAllowed).']/';
00111         $str = preg_replace($pattern, '', $str);
00112         
00113         while (substr_count($str, '  ') > 0) {
00114             $str = str_replace('  ', ' ', $str);
00115         }
00116         $str = str_replace(' ', '-', $str);
00117         $str = str_replace('ä', 'ae', $str);
00118         $str = str_replace('ö', 'oe', $str);
00119         $str = str_replace('ü', 'ue', $str);
00120         $str = str_replace('Ä', 'Ae', $str);
00121         $str = str_replace('Ö', 'Oe', $str);
00122         $str = str_replace('Ü', 'Ue', $str);
00123         $str = str_replace('ß', 'ss', $str);
00124         $str = str_replace('-.', '.', $str);
00125         
00126         $str = $replaceDots ? str_replace('.','',$str) : $str; 
00127         
00128         while (substr_count($str, '..') > 0) {
00129             $str = str_replace('..', '.', $str);
00130         }
00131         
00132         return $str;
00133     }
00134 }
